title: 820-2849 Bad GPU?
message:
820-2849 no sign of liquid damage. Powers cycles on and off for about a 1/2 second, during that time fan spins and all rails appear to be present. 

Not much experience working on this board, I'm starting to think GPU is toast.

Any thoughts?

Thanks

title: 820-2849 Bad GPU?
message:
How did this happen?
U2850 pin 4 pulses too?
Also check pins 2/4 of U7980.
Check voltage for all Power FETs at page 73.
3V42 and PPBUS_G3H stable?
Does it stay on in SMC bypass mode?
